title: Time to interactive
summary: Time to Interactive (TTI) is a non-standardized web performance 'progress' metric defined as the point in time when the last Long Task finished and was followed by 5 seconds of network and main thread inactivity.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
